Name: aar-sheikhmahmoudab
Author: Sheikh Mahmoud Abdel Qader Hamz And Group Of Scholars

Translations.Text: Sinni Rabbih foocih soolok meesite mari, namma jannat le
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Caxâ mixuu kee mexexu le luud le namma jannata
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Ama namma jannatih addal gexxa namma dara tan
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Ken nammayih addal ummaan caxâ mixuk namma qaynat yan
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Yallih foocih soolok meesite mari ama namma jannatal ruffu iyyan, fidooday adda kak gibdi cariirik kibuk tanil cusuulah anuk namma jannatih mexexih mafaala keenil xayih
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Woo fidoodal wagitto isi baqoltit yayseede agabi yan, ken baqoltik duma seehada keenil morbinnaay, jinni keenil morbinna fidoh
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Ta agabi qaxah wirya yaaqhuut kee marjaan innah
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Addunyal maqaané abe marih galto akeeral jannatak sa macaay
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Edde yabne namma jannatâ kalah namma jannat yan
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Ama namma jannat inxixih cuuginih
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Ken nammayih addal namma daray nabam darittay aggiriqqe wayta tan
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Ama namma jannatih addal caxâ mixuu kee tamiiraay (nakilaay), rummaan yan
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Woo jannootah addal cal meqe agabuy kaxxam qaxmeqe yan
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Woo jannootah addal curral qayniy wagitto isi baqoltit tayseedey, luuluk tan qarwah addal tani elle tan
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Ken baqoltik duma seehada keenil morbinnaay, jinni keenil morbinna fidoh
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Anxax makaddid (barkumaamii) kee qaxmeqe fiddiimil cusuulah anuk
Toysa seehadaa kee jinnik sin Rabbi siinih yecee niqmatittek dirabbossaanam ma niqmataay
Ku Rabbih migaq saytuniih, kay kayri maggoh, usuk dudda le nabna leeh, kaal yeemene marah mattaccoo leeh, konnaba le
